Package model

The model package for the Gizmoball application The model holds the current state of the game and is responsible for updating its state during play

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IBall
    An interface for the ball
    IModel
    An Interface for the Model
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Ball
    This represents any balls in the model
    Board
    Represents the board the game is played on
    CollisionDetails
    Stores the time until there is a collision and the post collision velocity
    FileManager
    Responsible for loading and saving the files This object is responsible for loading from the file and creating new boards, as well as saving existing boards.
    Global  
    Model
    The model This class is designed to be a controller for the model
    Walls
    Used to represent the walls

Package model Description

The model package for the Gizmoball application The model holds the current state of the game and is responsible for updating its state during play
